tool.name: AWS Comprehend Entity Extraction
tool.description: Named entity recognition with AWS Comprehend

param.name: amp_transcript
param.label: AMP Transcript
param.help: AMP Transcript file from speech-to-text with timestamp adjusted

param.name: s3_bucket
param.label: S3 Bucket
param.help: Name of an existing bucket in AWS S3

param.name: data_access_role
param.label: IAM Data Access Role
param.help: An AWS IAM role providing access from AWS comprehend to S3

param.name: ignore_types
param.label: Types to Ignore
param.help: Comma separated list of entity types to ignore. For instance, 'QUANTITY, DATE'.

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
Extract named entities using Amazon Comprehend Web Service.
